page.title: 02R.A.F. Cottesmore
page.content: We live on the R.A.F. camp.On camp there is a big sports-field where the men play Hockey,Football and Rugby. Sometimes they do Archery or jogging round the field.Over the road there are 2 tennis courts and by the courts is the Officer's Mess.At the end of the sports-field is Quorn Cresent where the Station Commander lives.On this camp there are people from three nations:British, Italians and Germans. The men are here to fly the Tornados. Sometimes a British pilot would fly with a German navigator or an Italian pilot would fly with a British navigator. There are 4 hangers,A,B,C&D, they are made of bricks and steel.In the hangers it is cold,it has a concrete floor and is lit up at night.The runway is solid concrete.There are also inflatable hangers.
